summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingGive BackRose Deep Hydration Face Cream is Fresh's best-selling hyaluronic acid moisturizer and delivers 72-hour deep hydration with strengthening damask rose extract for dewy, plump skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsDeeply hydrates for 72 hoursStrengthens the skin's barrierSoothes dry skin for a plump, dewy lookKey IngredientsDamask rose extract is scientifically proven to boost skin’s natural hyaluronic acid levels and strengthen skin’s barrier to protect from water lossHyaluronic acid duo of high (1,500 kDA) and low (50 kDA) molecular weight work to instantly hydrate the skin's surface and deliver hydration into the deeper layers of the epidermisTime-release technology delivers continuous hydration by creating a micro network on the skin’s surfaceRosewater helps to calm and sootheRose flower oil is an oil distilled from the rose bud to help hydrate, tone, soothe, and balance the complexionResearch Results72-hour deep hydration*24hr strengthened skin barrier**100% said it provided immediate hydration***98% felt immediately plumped with moisture***100% felt skin was smooth & supple***98% noticed skin was dewy****instrumental test, 11 subjects**instrumental test, 10 subjects, 24 hrs***self-assessment, 60 subjects, 4 weeksItem 2584147How To UseApply a dime-sized amount to the face daily, morning and night. Use after Rose Deep Hydration Oil-Serum for a boost of hydration. For best results, apply cream after previous skincare steps are fully absorbed.IngredientsAqua (Water), Glycerin, C15-19 Alkane, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Isostearyl Isostearate, Hexyl Laurate, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2 Hexanediol, Behenyl Alcohol, Steareth-2, Prunus Domestica Seed Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Rosa Damascena Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Angelica Keiskei Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Silica, Dimethicone, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Steareth-21, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Squalane, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tromethamine, Xanthan Gum, Dimethiconol, Polysorbate 60, Algin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Acacia Senegal Gum, Serine, Caramel, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citronellol, Geraniol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a dime-sized amount to the face daily, morning and night. Use after Rose Deep Hydration Oil-Serum for a boost of hydration. For best results, apply cream after previous skincare steps are fully absorbed.

reviews.headline: Overall nice moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is a fairly thick moisturizer that seems to do a good job keeping the skin hydrated. The  scent is not super strong, but I don't care for it. The jar is kind of heavy as well.

reviews.headline: Pills
reviews.comments: Pills with the rest of my skincare routine. It's a nice, thick cream, but avoid for daytime use.

reviews.headline: The best face cream
reviews.comments: Nothing fancy here, just the most hydrating face cream I have ever used. The scent is amazing, not overpowering, and the cream is not greasy. I would give it 10 stars if it were available.

reviews.headline: Love it been 5 years now
reviews.comments: I have been using this for 5 years and absolutely love it. However I put mine on at night before bed and never had an issue.

reviews.headline: Great product.
reviews.comments: Great product.  Buy it on a regular basis.

reviews.headline: Great cream!
reviews.comments: Love the texture and smell of this cream. I use it everyday in the morning after my cleanser. It feels refreshing and lightweight.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Love the day and night cream

reviews.headline: Wouldn't absorb, led to dryness and acne
reviews.comments:
Huge fan of fresh products. Received in a sample and then bought the full size. Within 6 weeks my skin got so dry, tight, and inflamed. Acne sprung up. The skin especially around my chin / jaw / cheeks started cracking and scabbing. It smells and feels so nice but the end result over time was not good. Switched my moisturizer and immediately the cracking, inflammation, and acne went back to normal. 

Love Fresh but not this product.

reviews.headline: To small
reviews.comments: They dont give that much product to see if it does anything and it clog my pours more

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: It works great. Its not greasy. It absorbs well, and my skin is soft. My sensitive skin is not adversly affected in any way. It's a good moisturizer, and it's light scent smells great.

reviews.headline: Returned immediately
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this moisturizer because I've loved other products from Fresh and I love the scent, but it was very disappointing. I used it at night after my full routine, and noticed within about 30 minutes that my skin felt tight (not moisturized). It was like the product had dried into a layer sitting on top of my skin. The next morning my skin didnt feel well-hydrated at all, in fact I had dry patches in areas that would typically be fine with previous moisturizers I've used. Unfortunate for the high price point, but maybe it's just not for me.

reviews.headline: I want to love it
reviews.comments: I really really wanted to love this moisturizer because of the texture, fragrance and overall feeling when putting it on but the peeling is crazy! For the price this product should not be peeling off pf my face within 5 minutes of me putting it on. Love the texture + fragrance but hate the peeling.

reviews.headline: Pills Like Crazy
reviews.comments: I havd been using this for a while now and it pills like drazy after it dries down - which translates on the makeup since it comes off when you apply. I know its not my skin since i exfoliate - so it shouldn't be doing this. I'm disappointed.

reviews.headline: Dries skin out
reviews.comments: This product is very drying to me. I have used much cheaper products that made my skin feel way better than. Def wont be repurchasing

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: Immediately pills and doesnt layer other products well. I was really excited to try this:/

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: This is one of the best moisturizers I have used. I use tretinion as my retinol and it tends to make my skin dry and flaky. I don't have that issue using this product. I see a lot of people complain about the strong rose scent. It think its delightful and doesn't linger too long but you have to understand what the product is derived from which rose petals snd buds. I use it day and night it I have seen improvements in my skin texture.

reviews.headline: great for dry, sensitive skin - but strong fragrance!
reviews.comments: Got this on sale to try out some other moisturizer options (go-to is Peach&Lily matcha pudding). The texture is wonderful, and I do think it helped with my dry/sensitive skin, but I am not personally a huge fan of the strong fragrance.

reviews.headline: not cruelty free
reviews.comments: i loved this moisturizer until i realized it wasnt cruelty free… a very nice subtle rose scent that i loved. sad i have to discontinue using this moisturizer.

faceoff_positive.comments: As a licensed esthetician of 8 years, you can say that I'm pretty picky about what skin care products I use on my face. Though I was gifted this face cream by the brand, I want to be clear that my review is influenced solely on my education background and experience. I am 32,  combination skin type (mildly oily Tzone in the summer, but mostly dehydrated), and prefer my moisturizers to feel somewhat thick and leave my skin glowy. I personally love the way this cream feels and looks on my skin, it definitely leaves my skin dewy and feels moist throughout the day. It also plays well with my sunscreen and makeup on top. My skin is usually clear, but can be prone to acne when I'm stressed or if slacking off with cleaning my makeup brushes, slept with my makeup on, etc. This product does contain 2 known pore clogging ingredients, isostearyl isostearate and algin. These ingredients don't necessarily mean you will break out, just that you are more likely to if you are someone who is very acne-prone. I personally haven't had any since using. If you are very sensitive to essential oils or strong scents, this cream also might not be for you. I don't have any issues with this though and actually love the rose smell! The scent really stays with you for about an hour, so you must be a rose fan! I find myself looking forward to applying it twice a day. If my skin preferences sound like yours, I'd recommend it for sure.
faceoff_positive.headline: Some tips to consider, but I really like it!

faceoff_negative.comments:
This packaging was very cute and the jar was made out of glass. I liked that it was a baby pink color, the texture was thick yet had a thin consistency.

It was too strong for me though, the over scented rose was too potent for my nostrils.
I did use it on my hands which made it feel smoother, but I can not apply to my face. 

Sensitive skin - NO 
Eczema Prone - NO
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for me
